amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 118-12 to strike the provisions relating to reviewing the professional development materials in sections 104 and 202.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike provisions permitting parents and guardians to review professional development materials for educators.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jacobs amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 217 (Roll no. 155).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Jacobs.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jacobs amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 217 (Roll no. 155).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
